Reviews.Title: blackberry 8330
Reviews.Author: Laura Dupre
Reviews.Content: I can't send picture messages or receive picture messages i just can't wait to get another phone it will not be a blackberry 8330

Reviews.Title: OK as far as basic phones go
Reviews.Author: Jackie Lyons
Reviews.Content: The phone works ok as a phone but does not work well with messaging, and the tracking ball is easily broken so I had to order replacements.

Reviews.Content: Good!! excellent items, its perfect and work excellent this is best good and I think buy more again thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: RIM Blackberry 8330 Silver Verizon Smartphone Camera GPS
Reviews.Author: F. E. Felty
Reviews.Content: Unit arrived in good time and had no physical defects. After transfering everything to the new device, everything was fine for about 6-7 days. Then it spontaneously rebooted one time. A couple days later, it happened again this time twice about 3 hours apart. Then it started happening every day, up to 5 times each day. The device was returned for refund. As a matter of curosity, I just checked (02May13) and the $39.99 has yet to be refunded to my debit card.

Reviews.Title: Two phones in six days
Reviews.Author: RICHMOND C WILSON
Reviews.Content: I have to say my experience with Amazon has been good. Passport has gone beyond what I would expect. The time was perfect. Arrived the first day of expected delivery date. The phone sent was the wrong phone 8830 instead of 8330. I was satisfied with the 8830 Blackberry, except it didn't have a camera. I notified passport. They sent me a updated Blackberry 8530 and told me to keep both phones.

Reviews.Title: The best product in the world.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why the picture of the phone advertised is green.The phone is silver and black.I wanted to tell the seller and Amazon that I really appreciate it. I love this phone. Also it was advertised as not coming with charger,but it did and I'm grateful for it.It Al's. Came with battery, and 2 earphones sets.I have been wanting one of these phones for a long time. When the opportunity came for me, I'm glad I took the chance to order it.There's nothing wrong with this phone. It's absolutely perfect. Thank you so much.Lovvvvvvvveeeeeeeee iiiiiittttttt sssssooooooo mmmmmuuuuucccchhhhh...
